Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Equip = Tool:WaitForChild("Equip") FireSound = Handle:WaitForChild("Fire")
FireFunction = Tool:WaitForChild("FireFunction")
Equipped = false MouseDown = false
ReloadTime = 5
Projectile = Instance.new("Part") Projectile.Name = "Projectile" Projectile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") Projectile.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Projectile.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Projectile.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Projectile.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 2, 0.2) Projectile.Anchored = false Projectile.Locked = true Projectile.CanCollide = false Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Head Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 1, 0.5) Mesh.Parent = Projectile PointLight = Instance.new("PointLight") PointLight.Brightness = 50 PointLight.Color = BrickColor.new("Really blue").Color PointLight.Range = 8 PointLight.Shadows = false PointLight.Enabled = true PointLight.Parent = Projectile
function PositionProjectile(handle, x, y, z) local HandleClone = handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame - HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * y local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * z local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame - HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * x return HandleCloneX.CFrame end
function Equipped(Mouse) Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end EquipAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Equip) if EquipAnim then EquipAnim:Play() end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Humanoid.Health > 0 and not MouseDown and Tool.Enabled then MouseDown = true Spawn(function() FireSound:Play() local FiringTime = tick() while MouseDown and Equipped and Humanoid.Health > 0 and (tick() - FiringTime) < 30 do local FiringPositions = { PositionProjectile(Handle, 0, 0.125, 0), PositionProjectile(Handle, 0, -0.2, 0), PositionProjectile(Handle, 0.14, -0.125, 0), PositionProjectile(Handle, -0.14, -0.125, 0), PositionProjectile(Handle, 0.14, 0.04, 0), PositionProjectile(Handle, -0.14, 0.04, 0) } for i = 1, math.random(1, 6) do if MouseDown and Equipped then local StartingPoint = FiringPositions[math.random(1, #FiringPositions)] table.remove(FiringPositions, i) FireFunction:InvokeServer((StartingPoint + Handle.CFrame.lookVector * ((Handle.Size.Z / 2) + (Projectile.Size.Y / 2))), Humanoid.TargetPoint) end end local TimeFiring = (tick() - FiringTime) local ExtraWaitTime = ((TimeFiring < 5 and math.abs((5 - TimeFiring) / 5)) or 0) wait((0.1 + ExtraWaitTime)) end FireSound:Stop() Tool.Enabled = false wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end) end end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown = false end) if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false MouseDown = false FireSound:Stop() if EquipAnim then EquipAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Damage = 5
Projectile = Instance.new("Part") Projectile.Name = "Projectile" Projectile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Pastel Blue") Projectile.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Projectile.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Projectile.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Projectile.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Projectile.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 2, 0.2) Projectile.Anchored = false Projectile.Locked = true Projectile.CanCollide = false Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Head Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 1, 0.5) Mesh.Parent = Projectile PointLight = Instance.new("PointLight") PointLight.Brightness = 50 PointLight.Color = BrickColor.new("Really blue").Color PointLight.Range = 8 PointLight.Shadows = false PointLight.Enabled = true PointLight.Parent = Projectile
FireFunction = (Tool:FindFirstChild("FireFunction") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) FireFunction.Name = "FireFunction" FireFunction.Parent = Tool
FireFunction.OnServerInvoke = (function(Player, Origin, Direction) local Character = Player.Character local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Humanoid then return end local ProjectileClone = Projectile:Clone() local Mass = (ProjectileClone:GetMass() * 196.20) local BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, Mass, 0) BodyForce.Parent = ProjectileClone ProjectileClone.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit ~= Handle then if Hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") or Hit.Parent:IsA("Tool") then Hit = Hit.Parent end local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end if ProjectileClone and ProjectileClone.Parent then ProjectileClone:Destroy() end end end) Debris:AddItem(ProjectileClone, 3) ProjectileClone.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") ProjectileClone.CFrame = Origin Direction = CFrame.new(ProjectileClone.Position, Direction) ProjectileClone.CFrame = Direction * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) ProjectileClone.Velocity = Direction.lookVector * 125 end)
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
